item.title: [Python] How to use folium (visualization of location information)
item.description: ## Overview Here is a package called folium that is useful for handling geographic information in Python. About folium folium is a library that wraps a JavaScript library called Leaflet in Python. Create a Map object Add various shapes to Map object Save the Map object as html By following the procedure, you can easily create an HTML file containing an interactive map. On JupyterLab, the map is displayed on the screen by simply displaying the Map object.
